Commands.Snap Punch: 5-hit Melee BRV attack + HP attackSelf: 3 turns ATK Up I, SPD Up I
Commands.Touch of Death: Melee BRV attackTarget: Fair chance Poison for 3 turns
Commands.Tornado Kick: usable when EX gauge is filled
Commands.Tornado Kick+: while Greased Lightning is at 1 stack

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Rapid Speed: Raises Speed by 10% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Snap Punch: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Snap Punch by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Touch of Death: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Touch of Death by 10%.

Passives.Antibody: Moderately raises resistance to Poison and reduces the probability of getting it.
Passives.Snap Punch Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Snap Punch.
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces action delay when using abilities continuously.
Passives.Touch of Death Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Touch of Death.
Passives.Touch of Death Charge: Increases the max uses of Touch of Death by 1.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Snap Punch Charge: Increases the max uses of Snap Punch by 1.
Passives.Greased Lightning: Slightly raises Attack and Speed for 4 turns when the battle starts

Weapons.Hellish Claw: Increases the potency of Touch of Death and lowers its action delay.Raises the success rate of Poison and extends its duration.Extends all granted buffs by 1 turn.
Weapons.Sphairai: Increases the potency of Snap Punch.Extends the duration of Attack Up and Speed Up.
